channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: Todd Snyder 发现，男士们需要适合工作的服装，但他们也会偶尔放纵一下。这一理念推动他的品牌走向成功。
item.description:
Todd Snyder saw that men wanted palatable, work-appropriate clothes, but they also indulge on occasion. That thesis has propelled his brand to success. https://t.co/7e4qS2GyR6 https://t.co/7e4qS2GyR6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：对美国人来说，海地常年的、看似难以克服的饥饿游戏是一个巨大的诱惑。但放弃并不是一种选择，@MaryAnastasiaOG 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The temptation is great for Americans to turn away from Haiti’s perennial, seemingly insurmountable, hunger games. But giving up isn’t an option, writes @MaryAnastasiaOG. https://t.co/qnuglo0V7X

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 远离东京和京都的旅游人群，日本的一条多日徒步旅行线路让游客沉浸在 2011 年遭受毁灭性海啸袭击的社区的文化和美食之中
item.description:
Far from the tourist crowds of Tokyo and Kyoto, a Japanese multi-day hiking trail immerses travelers in the culture and cuisine of a community hit by a devastating tsunami in 2011 https://t.co/ODtZcvIJlb https://t.co/ODtZcvIJlb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: "Z世代美国人从大流行病中走出来，对未来的悲观情绪超过了之前任何一代人。他们对两党的决策者都感到厌烦。
item.description:
“We’re just kind of over it.”

Gen Z Americans emerged from the pandemic feeling more pessimistic about the future than any living generation before it. And they’re fed up with policymakers from both parties. https://t.co/fQ3FcL2Gdg https://t.co/fQ3FcL2Gdg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024

item.title: 麦肯锡、波士顿咨询公司（BCG）和德勤（Deloitte）等老牌大型咨询公司受雇为全球最大的企业预测未来，但它们却弄错了自己的命运--其后果是一团糟
item.description:
Big and established consulting firms such as McKinsey, BCG and Deloitte, which are paid to predict the future for the world’s biggest corporations, have gotten their own destiny wrong—and the fallout is messy https://t.co/P7oBTjgPGG https://t.co/P7oBTjgPGG

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:

item.title: 亿万富翁、科技投资者马克-安德森（Marc Andreessen）和他的妻子劳拉-阿里亚加-安德森（Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen）在马里布花费数年时间积累了超过 2.5 亿美元的财产后，将他们长期居住的阿瑟顿住宅推向市场。
item.description:
Billionaire tech investor Marc Andreessen and his wife, Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen, are putting their longtime Atherton home on the market after spending years and more than $250 million accumulating property in Malibu https://t.co/HbW7h4U0nd https://t.co/HbW7h4U0nd

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/wGSw4zRbCO https://t.co/wGSw4zRbCO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 17 年后，长滩州立大学和教练丹-蒙森（Dan Monson）同意分道扬镳。然后，他同意继续执教，并率领他的球队不出意外地进入了 NCAA 锦标赛。
item.description:
After 17 years, Long Beach State and coach Dan Monson agreed to part ways. Then he agreed to finish out the campaign—and led his team to an improbable NCAA tournament bid. https://t.co/gnJQhPGSSL https://t.co/gnJQhPGSSL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 最高法院周一似乎对政府在敦促社交媒体平台删除有关 Covid-19 和其他公共安全风险的误导性帖子时违反宪法的说法表示怀疑
item.description:

item.title: 中国监管机构发现中国恒大集团旗下最重要的子公司在公司倒闭前几年以欺诈手段提高销售额和利润，中国恒大集团可能面临超过 5 亿美元的罚款。
